data.text: “Angʼo momiyo Jehova Nyasaye Maratego
Ji ma timbegi richo ketho kiewo;
Gikwalo punda nyathi kich kendo gikawo rwadh pur achiel
Gimono jochan yudo adiera
Joma odhier tiyo matek kamanyo chiemo e thim, mana ka punda;
Gichoko chiemb jamni
Ginindo duk gotieno nikech gionge lewni;
Kodh ajiki mag gode olwoko dendgi
Nyathi maonge gi wuon iyudho oko e thuno;
Giwuotho duk e gwengʼ nikech gionge lewni;
Ji chunogi gitoyo zeituni kuonde ma gin ema gikunyo,
Chur mar joma tho ochomo polo koa e dala maduongʼ
“Nitie jomoko mangʼanyo ne ler,
Ka ler mar odiechiengʼ rumo aruma nii,
Wangʼ jachode bende rito mondo piny oimre;
Jokuo turo udi gotieno,
Giduto mudho mandiwa chalnegi okinyi;
“To kata kamano gichalo buoyo moyienyo ewi pi malo;
Joricho lal nono e piny ma ji odakie,
Onge ngʼama paro joricho kendo wich wil kodgi;
Gisando mon ma chwogi otho
To Nyasaye tieko joma roteke gi tekone;
Onyalo weyogi mi gipar ni gin gi kwe,
Gineno maber kuom kinde matin kende to bangʼe gilal nono kadiemo wangʼ,
“Ka gik ma awachogo miriambo,
